price: Dhugumatti, Nuti wantoota ishee (dachii) irra jiran hunda dirree duwwaa biqilaa hin qabne taasisoodha.
arabic: وَإِنَّا لَجَٰعِلُونَ مَا عَلَيۡهَا صَعِيدٗا جُرُزًا

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: wa-innā lajāʿilūna mā ʿalayhā ṣaʿīdan juruzan
